author: Lan Nguyen Thi Tuyet
text:
Hello rushia tôi là người việt nam. Trong các buổi live stream của bạn đã có những người việt comment các câu chửi thậm tệ hay spam thì mong cậu bỏ qua vì chúng nó chưa hiểu chuyện thậm chí bọn nó còn chưa học đên cấp   2 nếu cậu thấy các comment như "send nude, cặc, lồn, địt,....." cậu có thể chặn vĩnh viễn.
Còn các bạn việt nam thì đừng comment 1 cách thiếu ý thức như thế nữa, các  bạn đang làm cho các bạn bè quốc tế có cái nhìn xấu về chúng ta đấy !
Xin hãy tự trọng !

author: 28. Hoa Quỳnh
text: @Haru Kage  mình muốn xin lỗi người khác cũng chả liên quan đến bạn với lại xin lỗi sau khi stream thì nó bớt trôi được tí chứ tui chả ngu vào stream xin lỗi cho nó trôi à

author: Haru Kage
text:
@28. Hoa Quỳnh  Vậy bạn cứ xin lỗi, rồi tụi nó report là chuyện của bạn ^_^

Vậy khỏi cần rep nha, đời người mà thích xin lỗi những thứ mình không làm cũng kì cục lắm bạn. Thân ái là nên dẹp đi, kẻo bị coi là lắm trò đấy.

author: 28. Hoa Quỳnh
text:
@Haru Kage  mình chả phải người thích đi xin lỗi bạn ạ vs lại xin lỗi sao khi kết thúc stream nên cũng chả spam là mấy nha. Mình viết tiếng anh để họ dễ hiểu hơn đó tránh  trường hợp họ không hiểu rồi nói này kia. À mà mình cmt trước khi bạn dì đó ở trên nói vs mình về việc Rushia không thích xin lỗi khá là lâu nên mình mới không xóa thôi.
Xin lỗi 1 lần đc rr tui đâu rảnh đi xin lỗi hoài chớ

author: Haru Kage
text:
@28. Hoa Quỳnh  thì tùy bạn thôi, chứ riêng mình thấy là spam rồi. Tốt nhất là tránh nhau ra kẻo gây mất lòng :v

Edit: Cơ mà khuyên thực sự đó, trước khi xin lỗi nên nghiêm cứu trước, ở bên r/hololive nó có nhắn là tốt nhất đừng xin lỗi rồi. Dù gì nữa thì chúc một ngày vui vẻ hay gì đó ~.~

author: Skedemon
text:
I WANT TO SHARE THESE THINKING TO WHO DISRESPECT VIETNAM. PLS LISTEN, I DONT DISRESPECT ANYONE.
So here is the thing, im sure that some foreigners are really hate vietnam.
Pls you guys, understand this for us. Those spammers/troller are the kiddos in our country, they dont have awareness man, they still just kids.
And we are real fan, viewers, we enjoy rushia stream a peacefully way, but SOME FOREIGNERS just really disrespect us
Some say sentences like: ban vietnamese, stop use vietnamese, vietnam get out of here, etc
Dude, READ THE RULE PLS, there are rules under decribesion, wrote by english, read it pls. If we followed it, still why you guys hate us? 
Why racism, can you guys tell me why? Just because some kiddos in our country disrespect rushia? And because of that, you guys hate all vietnamese viewers? Man, forgive them, they dont have awareness. But still, you dislike all vietnamese people, you even disrespect us. Man, if you disrespect us, you just like those kiddo: awareness, not think before saying.
Still we having really many people that cone to rushia stream just for watch, enjoy the stream, even just for report vietnamese comments have bad contents. So you guys no need to worry, we even have mod if you attention.
Also ok, just say rushia ban vietnam. Trust me, rushia wont listen, even you say billion times, she wont. Bc she respect us, she always forgive her fandeads. Dude, thats why rushia our best girl.
Stop say those sentences. Because it just make this war more bloody. Even it will make rushia more sad, im not kiding, its not cool, its not a way to protect our rushia, it just make her more painful. And if you like that, get out of here.
So ok, i say again, we are friend, not the enemy. We are all viewers, fandeads, so pls, respect each other, specially follow the chat rules. If you can do all those thing, im sure rushia will really happy. ( sorry for my bad english ).
Also rushia, again thanks for your hard work for the stream. Love you ❤❤

author: Night Raid
text: Every country has the same kind of spammers, just on different platforms. They're mostly on COD and other online games here in the States. I, at least, understand that a small, annoying  group of people dont define a country.

author: Skedemon
text: @Night Raid   thanks for understand that :)) sure that every country always have the kiddos generation dont have awareness. I real can forgive them, bc you know, they still growing up.

author: Jason Nguyen
text: Man you acting likes a child right now. Yes, there are some minority that hated vietnamese but like the spammer you just have to report and move on do not give them attention. And I do understand the part about not using vietnamese in the chat, if lots of spammer in the chat using different languages nobody will knows about that the meaning of it that why we have to keep it in English and Japanese for now also if you use Japanese will you will get a better chance at being noted by her

author: Skedemon
text: @Jason Nguyen  welp, you right, sorry for my acting, but still im using english, im not use vietnamese btw, bc i know use vietnamese is still... not good in this situation huh

author: Jason Nguyen
